H0.text: Crocodile, goblin and greenland are types of which fish. Ray

H1.text: Crocodile, goblin and greenland are types of which fish. Wrasse

H2.text: Crocodile, goblin and greenland are types of which fish. Gurnard

H3.text: Crocodile, goblin and greenland are types of which fish. Shark

A4.text: They include the goblin shark, basking shark, megamouth shark, the thresher sharks, shortfin and longfin mako sharks, and great white shark.
